Package src.recomanador.domini

Class Recomanacio

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.domini.Recomanacio
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Recomanacio>
public class Recomanacio extends Object implements Comparable<Recomanacio>
This class describes a recommendation of a item to a user with a possible rating.
